original_text: Azariah the son of Nathan was over the officers; Zabud the son of Nathan was priest and king's friend;
korean_text: 나단의 아들 아사리아는 지방 관장의 두령이요 나단의 아들 사붓은 제사장이니 왕의 벗이요

sentences.original_text: Azariah the son of Nathan was over the officers
Zabud the son of Nathan was priest and king's friend
sentences.korean_translation: 나단의 아들 사붓은 제사장이요 왕의 친구였다
